SEARCH
Package domain

Class MaintenanceController

java.lang.Object
domain.MaintenanceController
public class MaintenanceController extends Object
Controller class for managing maintenance operations. Handles CRUD operations for maintenance records and converts between DTOs and domain objects.

    • createMaintenance

      public void createMaintenance(Maintenance maintenance)
      Creates a new maintenance record in the database.
      Parameters:
      maintenance - the Maintenance object to create

    • createMaintenance

      public MaintenanceDTO createMaintenance(LocalDate executionDate, LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate, int technicianId, String reason, String comments, MaintenanceStatus status, int machineId) throws InformationRequiredExceptionMaintenance
      Creates a new maintenance record with detailed parameters.
      Parameters:
      executionDate - the date when maintenance was executed
      startDate - the planned start date/time
      endDate - the planned end date/time
      technicianId - the ID of the technician
      reason - the reason for maintenance
      comments - additional comments
      status - the maintenance status
      machineId - the ID of the machine being maintained
      Returns:
      the created MaintenanceDTO
      Throws:
      InformationRequiredExceptionMaintenance - if required fields are missing

    • updateMaintenance

      public void updateMaintenance(Maintenance maintenance)
      Updates an existing maintenance record.
      Parameters:
      maintenance - the Maintenance object to update

    • updateMaintenance

      public MaintenanceDTO updateMaintenance(int maintenanceId, LocalDate executionDate, LocalDateTime startDate, LocalDateTime endDate, int technicianId, String reason, String comments, MaintenanceStatus status, int machineId) throws InformationRequiredExceptionMaintenance
      Updates an existing maintenance record with detailed parameters.
      Parameters:
      maintenanceId - the ID of the maintenance to update
      executionDate - the new execution date
      startDate - the new start date/time
      endDate - the new end date/time
      technicianId - the new technician ID
      reason - the new reason
      comments - the new comments
      status - the new status
      machineId - the new machine ID
      Returns:
      the updated MaintenanceDTO
      Throws:
      InformationRequiredExceptionMaintenance - if required fields are missing
      IllegalArgumentException - if maintenance with given ID is not found
